content.text: Create a coffee shop locator with reviews and ordering system mobile first modern  look fully working

I will construct a comprehensive, multi-page Coffee Shop Locator application. This mobile-first platform will be built entirely with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern and responsive user interface. The application will feature several interconnected pages: a welcoming landing page (`index.html`), a searchable list of coffee shops (`shops.html`), a detailed view for each shop with menus and reviews (`shop-detail.html`), a complete ordering system with a cart (`order.html`), and an order confirmation page (`confirmation.html`). To manage the application's data, such as shop details, menus, and user reviews, I will use a mock database within a dedicated `data.js` file, simulating a real-world backend. The logic for each page will be encapsulated in its own JavaScript file (`shops.js`, `shop-detail.js`, `order.js`) to ensure modularity and maintainability. The user experience will be enhanced with interactive elements, smooth transitions, and a clean, modern aesthetic, including icons from Font Awesome and Lucide. All pages will be fully responsive and interconnected, providing a seamless user journey from discovery to ordering.
